name: Tucker Albach
description: Albach lives in anapartmenton the corner of Scoffield and Sinkyone Street inThe Glen,Heywood. She was formerly the Vice Managing Director of theKiroshi Opticscorporation. At some point in2077, while intoxicated, Albach hit a young girl named Rosita Fuscino with her car, severely wounding her. With no witnesses on the empty street and the collision occurring late at night, she kept on driving, leaving Rosita to slowly die of her injuries which otherwise could have been prevented had she received medical attention in time.
